creator: LovaAppsProdukcje
descriptionHtml:
Photo To Text Converter is a smart OCR application that convert images to live text easily. and recognize text from an image with high accuracy for FREE.

OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology can recognize all text on an image.
EDIT perspective and borders, apply filters, adjust brightness and contrast and more..

Photo To Text Converter is suitable for everyone, such as students, journalists, businessmen etc. This camera scanner and converter image scanner application will help you scan image to convert to text and save important documents on the phone through
high-quality PDF. Your phone will turn into a image to text converter & scanner.

Features:
* PDF converter
* Image To Text converter
* Multiple Language Support
* Extracts texts from a single page
* Supports text editing & sharing.

With photo to text OCR Scanner and converter You can scan:

• Texts from TV or smartphone screens
• Receipts and invoices
• Labels
• Documents
• Business cards
• Magazines, Articles and books
• Manuals and much more!

Extract text seamlessly with your device camera now!

How the photo to text scanner & converter work:

• Capture: scan document to PDF with precision.
• Live scan photo to text or select a photo from your photo gallery. Easily preview, rearrange, crop, rotate, and edit your document
• Auto-detect text, save in PDF format to use content repeatedly.

* Image to text convert or JPG to PDF, JPEG to PDF Capture high quality image or choose a photo in the gallery for picture to text converter & scanner. After a few seconds of picture to PDF text converter.
* Correct and Cut the image. You will have a neat and intuitive text with just a view taps
* Edit extracted text.

You can always edit directly into this text. To help you work with the best text, image to word document converter app provide you with tools: copy,
and delete text.

* Save text in PDF format:
The PDF format is the best way for you to save your important documents. Even lengthy legal documents become manageable.

This is a FREE text scanner & converter application that scan your text to be send later via email or share on social media or you can copy that text in clipboard and later can be used in any other app.

Note: This picture to word converter app can not receive handwriting. The text will be recognized best in clear picture.

so Photo To Text Converter OCR text scanner app has been developed to help you solving problems within a second. just open the app and scan your desire text or photo.Dont worry if you are not connected to internet and you have to scan any document urgently so don’t worry you can also use ocr Photo To Text Scanner and Converter offline.

This is a FREE text scanner & converter application that scan your text that can later can be send via email or share on social media or you
can copy that text in clipboard and later can be used in any other app.
this app is suitable for everyone, such as students, businessmen, journalists, etc.

Note: This photo to word converter app can not convert handwriting. The text will be recognized best in clear picture.
descriptionShort: Convert image to text easily with OCR text scanner and extract text from photo
title: Photo To Text Converter
